summary: A newlywed sheriff tries to stop a shambling monster that has emerged from a spaceship to eat the citizens of an American town.
cast: Vic Savage|Shannon O'Neil|William Thourlby|John Caresio|Brendon Boone|Byrd Holland|Jack King|Pierre Kopp|Ken Savage|Mark Field|Les La Marr|Mary Price|Louise Lawson|Myra Lee|Buddy Mize|Lewis Lawson|Robin James|Ray Wickman|Connie Valoie|Rita Tubin|Kelly Adams|Al Lewis|Karl Goldenberg|Larry Burrell|Paul J. Hanson
keywords: unintentional humor|accidental nudity|child eaten off screen|giant animal|psychotronic film
title: The Creeping Terror
